channel.title: Adding skillcape emote button?
channel.description:
i want to add skillcape emote button onto the emote list. but i ended up adding the button onto another emote instead... how do i make the emote scroll bar scroll more down and have enough room to fit in the skilcape emote button? all i edited so far was rsinterface.java
THIS IS A PI 317
